name: Zen El
description:
Have a relaxing time making an island and watching the water flow in this pixel art game.

--Instructions--

Zoom in or out with: Scroll wheel, I and O, + and -, [ and ], or HOME and END.

Pan by dragging with the mouse, arrow keys, or WASD.

Open the menu by clicking the translucent [ . . . ] button in the lower left corner or pressing SPACE.  Now you can see your cloud puffs in the lower left and menu buttons along the bottom.

Click a button to select an item or open up a menu of items. 

Place items with the left mouse button and erase them with the right mouse button. You can click the [Pencil] button on the right, above the menu, to flip these controls - erasing items with the left mouse button and placing them with the right.

Hold down SHIFT to keep the screen from moving and to place/erase multiple items in a row.

If an item cycles through variations in its button, you can click the button to change the variation you're using.

Place cloud banks in the water, let them fill up over time, and erase them to "pop" them and get some extra puffs.

Create an island that is soothing for you to look at!

---------------------------------------------------------------

ZenEl ("zen" +  "pixel"; pixel being from "picture" + "element")
